entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature rising to minus 18 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of light snow late this evening and overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 18 by morning. Wind chill minus 32 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CDT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow. High minus 16.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 16. Wind chill near minus 27. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CDT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Blowing snow at times overnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming east 40 gusting to 60 after midnight. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 26 in the evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CDT Thursday 23 March 2023
